Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-0725 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.40-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-0725 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.40-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package mysql is earlier than 8.0.40-4, affected by CVE-2025-0725
